Title: Whoever He Is
Writer: Courtney A. Kemp (created by), Courtney A. Kemp, Salvatore Stabile, Vladimir Cvetko (staff writer)
Actors: Omari Hardwick, Lela Loren, Naturi Naughton, Joseph Sikora
Plot: Ghost and Tommy attempt to deal with those responsible for the attack on their drug organization. Ghost's wife has a new career.
